Translations.Text: Ja nie kult co ona kult
Nor robit ona kult co ja kult
Nor will ja vzdy kult co ona kult
Nor will ona vzdy kult co ja kult
Do ona bol tvoj nabozenstvo mi bol moj nabozenstvo
Ona see ludia embracing GOD's nabozenstvo do zhluk
Ona glorify chvalit tvoj Lord implore Him for forgiveness! He bol Redeemer
Condemned som robota z Abee Lahab he condemned
Jeho peniaze whatever he accomplished never pomoc him
Ona resurrected lano thorns ju krk
